org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.hardware

Class DragonboardGPIOPin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.hardware.DragonboardGPIOPin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DigitalChannel, HardwareDevice
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DragonboardLynxDragonboardIsPresentPin, DragonboardLynxProgrammingPin, DragonboardLynxResetPin, DragonboardLynxUserButton

    public abstract class DragonboardGPIOPin
extends java.lang.Object
implements DigitalChannel
    DragonboardGPIOPin controls an exported GPIO pin on the Dragonboard
